mapper.sql: id, username, password, realname, mobile, email, salt, deleted, status, birthday, gender, create_time, modify_time, login_time, last_login_time, first_login_time, count
mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.realname, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.salt, u.birthday, u.gender, u.status, u.deleted, u.create_time, u.modify_time, u.login_time, u.first_login_time, u.last_login_time, u.count, uoj.id as uorj_id, uoj.user_id, uoj.organization_id from sys_user as u, sys_user_organization_job as uoj where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and u.id = uoj.user_id;

select
from sys_user order id desc limit 50
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, username, password, realname, mobile, email, salt, deleted, status, birthday, gender, create_time, modify_time, login_time, last_login_time, first_login_time, count) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, #{modifyTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, #{loginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, #{lastLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, #{firstLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler},
login_time = #{loginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler},
first_login_time = #{firstLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler},
count = #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, login_time = #{loginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, first_login_time = #{firstLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ace.commons.mybatis.type.JodaDateTimestampTypeHandler}, count = #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
